column2: "It should be about time to meet up with Sara, where is she-?"
"I guess it can't be helped. This must be a shock, though I can't say I blame her."
"Nonono! I need to stop this minus way of thinking!"
"I can't let myself stay down, that's not like me at all!"
"That's right, I should be happy that I was saved just now! Yup, definitely!"
"What? Uh, I guess..."
"But more than that! I always thought that ARKS was up to no good!"
"Though, I didn't think it would put me on the brink of death! Thanks for saving me!"
"Ah, yeah. I'm glad we could help, but you're really not shocked or anything?"
"Well, it does come as a surprise, but does it help anything to throw a fuss over it?"
"It's not like standing here crying my eyes out is going to change anything, only actions, right?"
"I finally got into ARKS, just as I had dreamed, but if that's not the ARKS I had hoped for..."
"Then, I'll just have to make new ARKS from the ground up!"
"Fhufufufu haahahahaa ahahah!"

"Xiao, I'm here.
And you really came as a Support Partner!"
"Ahahhaha, you figured that out on your own? Not bad, Sara!"
"What's that, what's going on?"
"Come on, with me and Sara. The place where you belong isn't here."
"Just as you would have hoped, we're making a new ARKS."
"As for what form that's going to take, I have no way of explaining..."
"That's okay, I don't think that's up for me to decide. I think it's best to act as I see fit."
"With that, we've accomplished the alteration. I think it's time for you to head back."
"Don't worry, Sara and I will take care of her. You can count on that."
"Also, thanks again for saving me!"
"To Meet Again in Friendship"
"第７章 笑顔の再会のために"
